meanings.sent1: The artist used the daubiest colors to paint the sunset.
meanings.sent2: Her hands were covered in the daubiest paint after the art class.
meanings.sent3: The daubiest paint splattered on the canvas, creating a messy masterpiece.
meanings.sent4: The daubiest strokes of the brush added depth to the landscape painting.
meanings.sent5: The daubiest hues of blue and green blended beautifully in the artwork.

meanings.sent1: The wall was covered in the daubiest mud after the rainstorm.
meanings.sent2: His clothes were the daubiest after playing in the muddy field.
meanings.sent3: The daubiest footprints led to a hilarious mud fight between friends.
meanings.sent4: The daubiest patches of mud made the path slippery and treacherous.
meanings.sent5: The daubiest puddles reflected the gray sky above.
